title: The National driver's test
creator_credit: CBS News (for Shell), Warren V. Bush and Vern Diamond
brief_description: Designed to test the viewer’s judgement, knowledge and perception as a driver. Emphasises the importance of anticipating the wrong actions of other drivers and the learning of “defensive” driving techniques. Includes section on high-speed highway accidents. Made with the co-operation of the National Safety Council (USA) and the IBM Corporation. Introduced briefly by Stuart Wagstaff.
